channel.title: -Owner/Coder Of Holy Str Server, A.K.A P Czar, Need Help
channel.description: [sup]Ok. First Thing First. I Am A Coder, Owner Of P Czar And I Need Help Coding A Rune Cbow Into My Server. Also I Would Like To Know How To Create A Working Mage Bow Spec. Everyother Spec Works. So Any Assistance Would Be Helpful. When I Am Able To Rep I Will ++Rep You All. Ty.[/sup]

item.title: -Owner/Coder Of Holy Str Server, A.K.A P Czar, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

This is for the Magic Bow special attack (Item ID, 861)

Ok first off, search:

calculateSpecial()

Next find the mage bow one (861) and replace it with this

else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) { // mage bow startAnimation(1074); specialAmount -= 25;

Then search:

(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 100)

And replace the whole:

(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 100) { calculateSpecial(); DDZ(); usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

With:

(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 50) { if (specialAmount >= 50) { gfx110(250); GraphicsHandler.createProjectile( arrowgfx, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 70, 249, 43, 43, EnemyIndexP + 1, 410, EnemyY, EnemyX, 16); AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true; AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true; AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHitRange); AttackingOn2.hitDiff = hitDiff; Methods.specialAttacks(playerId); Methods.specialAttacks2(playerId); Methods.specialAttacks3(playerId); Methods.specialAttacks4(playerId); LoopHitDelay = 4; Methods.specialAttacks4(playerId); specialAmount -= 50; usingSpecial = false; }

This works perfect, I hope it works for you

Read full topic

item.title: -Owner/Coder Of Holy Str Server, A.K.A P Czar, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @eviltwin1 eviltwin1
item.description:
@eviltwin1 wrote:

ok well what ur first gonna need to do is add it into the item.cfg by opening it and adding this into it

item = 4214	Crystal_bow_full	A_nice_sturdy_magical_bow.	505512.837455532	10	10	10		10	10	10	100	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10	10

of course u can change all of the numbers but the first three to make it stronger (the first three numbers deal with the value of the bow u can change that as well if u wanna sell expensive in a store)

Read full topic
